categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: This Imperial captain served as the commander of the Super Star Destroyer Executor during Darth Vader's search for Luke Skywalker near the planet Kothlis in 3.5 ABY. Under this captain's command, the Executor failed to capture Skywalker and the Millennium Falcon in the Kothlis asteroid field. Nevertheless, the captain proceeded to oversee the Executor deliver a punishing show of force against Rebel forces in the Kothlis system in feigned pursuit of the plans to the second Death Star.
